articles.title: What is Feral File?
articles.description: Feral File presents curated exhibitions and builds tools that make collecting and displaying digital art part of everyday life.

articles.title: How to Collect Digital Art
articles.description: A guide for institutions on collecting digital art with blockchain—ensuring secure, lasting, and accessible stewardship for the future.

articles.title: Research
articles.description: Through research, Feral File collaborates with artists and institutions to prototype new ways of making, sharing, and experiencing digital art.

articles.title: FAQ
articles.description: Learn in-depth how Feral File works.

articles.title: Collector Services
articles.description: We help collectors live with digital art—through personalized support for acquiring, displaying, and protecting their collections.
